alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 12:38PM EDT until March 28 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Recent heavy rains are resulting in rises on the Green River. The river is forecast to crest at Paradise in minor flooding late this weekend. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From late tonight to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 380.0 feet, Water rises over the skimmer wall at the TVA fossil plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 375.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 381.1 feet late Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
